name: Amish Friendship Bread III
author: YAHOOESS
summary: A delicious way to use your Amish Friendship Starter. It's packed with apples, nuts and spices.
ingredients: 2  apples - peeled, cored and finely chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease two 9x5 inch loaf pans
Sift together flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, baking soda and salt, set aside In a large mixing bowl, stir together the  Amish Friendship Starter, eggs, oil and vanilla
Gradually stir in the sifted ingredients until just blended
Finally stir in the chopped nuts and apples
Divide the batter evenly between the two prepared pans
Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a loaf comes out clean
